document_data.name: Kuldus
document_data.mainbody: '''Kuldus''' was an [[upperpriest]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In late mid-{{yearlink|1357}}, Kuldus related unto the High Imperceptor of Bane that [[Manshoon]] was still missing from [[Zhentil Keep]] and that there was no word on [[Laelar]].
